text: Amblyomma triguttatum, commonly known as the kangaroo tick, is a species of tick in the genus Amblyomma native to Australia. There are four subspecies, one or more of which might be separate species. The nominate subspecies is a vector for Rickettsia. ==References== Category:Amblyomma Category:Animals described in 1844 Category:Arthropods of Australia
title: Amblyomma triguttatum
